channel.title: Davis County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Davis County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 South - Exits 312, 313 and 314
item.description: I-15 South approaching Exit 314 - Center St. Approaching Exit 313 - I-215 South/Belt Route/Salt Lake City International Airport. Approaching Exit 312 - US-89 South/Beck St. Continue south on I-15 to Salt Lake City.

item.title: End UT-193 East at US-89 North
item.description: End UT-193 East at US-89 North. Use US-89 north to Ogden.

item.title: UT-193 East Approaching US-89
item.description: UT-193 East approaching US-89 (Exit 404) in Layton. UT-193 ends here.

item.title: UT-193 East at UT-232 South
item.description: UT-193 East at UT-232 South (Hill Field Road) in Layton.

item.title: UT-193 East Approaching UT-232 (Hill Field Road)
item.description: UT-193 East approaching UT-232 (Hill Field Road). Turn left for Hill AFB south gate.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 334
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 334 - UT-193/700 South.

item.title: UT-103 East at I-15
item.description: UT-103 East (E 650 N) at I-15 junction (Exit 335). Turn right for I-15 South to Salt Lake City; continue under freeway for I-15 North to Ogden.

item.title: UT-126 North at UT-103 (To I-15)
item.description: UT-126 North (State St.) at UT-103 (E 650 N) in Clearfield. Turn right on UT-103 East for access to I-15 at Exit 335.

item.title: UT-193 East at UT-126
item.description: UT-193 East (E 700 S) at UT-126 (State St.) in Clearfield.

item.title: End UT-127 East at UT-108
item.description: End UT-127 East (Antelope Drive) at UT-108 (N 2000 W). Turn left on N 2000 W for UT-108 North; continue straight on Antelope Drive for UT-108 South.

item.title: UT-127 East Approaching UT-108
item.description: UT-127 East (Antelope Drive) approaching UT-108 (N 2000 W) in Syracuse.

item.title: End UT-110 South at UT-127 (Antelope Drive)
item.description: End UT-110 South (S 4500 W) at UT-127 (Antelope Drive) in Syracuse.

item.title: UT-37 West at UT-110
item.description: UT-37 West (W 1800 N) at UT-110 South (N 4500 W) in West Point.

item.title: UT-126 South at UT-37 - Sunset
item.description: UT-126 South (N Main St) at UT-37 in Sunset (W 1800 N).

item.title: Antelope Drive West at I-15 and UT-108
item.description: Antelope Drive West at I-15 North to Ogden. Continue over freeway for I-15 south to Salt Lake City. Antelope Drive West becomes UT-108 South.

item.title: Antelope Drive West Approaching I-15 and UT-108
item.description: Antelope Drive West approaching I-15 North to Ogden. Use inner right hand turn lane for 1400 West. Antelope Drive West becomes UT-108 South.

item.title: End UT-108 South at I-15
item.description: End UT-108 South at I-15 in Layton. Use I-15 north for Ogden. Use outer left turn lane for 1400 West. Continue east for East Antelope Drive .

item.title: UT-108 East at I-15 South (Exit 332)
item.description: UT-108 East at I-15 South (Exit 332) in Layton. Use I-15 south for Salt Lake City. Continue over freeway for I-15 North to Ogden.

item.title: UT-108 East - Layton
item.description: UT-108 East (Antelope Drive) in Layton.

item.title: UT-108 East at UT-126
item.description: UT-108 East (Antelope Drive) at UT-126 (N Main St.). Continue east on Antelope Drive for I-15.

item.title: End UT-127 West at UT-110
item.description: End UT-127 West (Antelope Drive) at UT-110 (S 4500 W).

item.title: UT-127 West approaching UT-110
item.description: UT-127 West approaching UT-110 in Syracuse. UT-127 west ends at UT-110. Continue straight on Antelope Drive for Antelope Island. Turn right on UT-110 for West Point.

item.title: UT-108 East at UT-127
item.description: UT-108 East (N 2000 W) at UT-127 (Antelope Drive) in Syracuse. Turn left to continue east on UT-108.

item.title: UT-108 South at UT-193
item.description: UT-108 South (N 2000 W) at UT-193

item.title: End UT-105 West at UT-67 South
item.description: End UT-105 West (Parrish Lane) at UT-67 South (Legacy Parkway) to Salt Lake City.

item.title: End UT-105 West at UT-67
item.description: End UT-105 West (Parrish Lane) at UT-67 (Legacy Parkway).

item.title: End UT-105 West at UT-67
item.description: End UT-105 West (Parrish Lane) at UT-67 (Legacy Parkway). Use UT-67 north for Farmington; UT-67 south for Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-15 South - Exits 325 and 324
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 325 - UT-225/Park Lane. Approaching Exit 324 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 324
item.description: I-15 North approaching Exit 324 - US-89 North/To I-84 East/South Ogden. Continue north on I-15 to Ogden.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 322
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 322 - UT-227 North/200 West. Approaching Exit 324 - US-89 North/To I-84 East/South Ogden. Continue north on I-15 to Ogden.

item.title: US-89 North at I-15 North Onramp
item.description: US-89 North at I-15 North onramp in Bountiful.

item.title: US-89 North at UT-68
item.description: US-89 North at UT-68 (W 500 S) in Bountiful.

item.title: US-89 North Approaching UT-68
item.description: US-89 North Approaching UT-68 (W 500 S) in Bountiful. Turn left on UT-68/W 500 S for I-15 South. Continue north on US-89 for I-15 north.

item.title: US-89 North Approaching UT-93
item.description: US-89 North approaching UT-93 (W 2600 S) in Bountiful.

item.title: US-89 South - Exits 395 and 394 - Approaching I-15
item.description: US-89 South at Exit 395 - UT-225/To I-15 North/Park Lane/Lagoon. Approaching Exit 394 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway. US-89 joins I-15 southbound for Salt Lake City. Use Exit 395 for access to Lagoon Amusement Park.

item.title: US-89 South - Exits 396 and 395
item.description: US-89 south at Exit 396 - UT-106/Shepard Lane. Approaching Exit 395 - UT-225/To I-15 North/Park Lane/Lagoon. On the left is a sign showing that trucks are prohibited on Legacy Parkway.

item.title: US-89 South - Exits 397, 396, and 394
item.description: US-89 South at Exit 397 - UT-273/Farmington/Kaysville. Approaching Exit 396 - UT-106/Shepard Lane. Approaching Exit 394 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway.

item.title: US-89 South - Exits 397 and 396
item.description: US-89 south approaching Exit 397 - UT-273/Farmington/Kaysville. Approaching Exit 396 - UT-106/Shepard Lane.

item.title: US-89 South - Exit 397
item.description: US-89 south approaching Exit 387 - UT-273/Farmington/Kaysville.

item.title: US-89 South - Exit 404
item.description: US-89 south approaching Exit 404 - UT-193/Clearfield/Hill AFB

item.title: US-89 South - Exit 405
item.description: US-89 south approaching Exit 405 - UT-60/South Weber Drive

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 322
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 322 - UT-227 North/200 West. Approaching Exit 324 - US-89 North/To I-84 East/South Ogden. Continue north on I-15 to Ogden.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 324
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 324 - US-89 North/To I-84 East/South Ogden.

item.title: I-15 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-15 north. Distance to Farmington, Layton, and Ogden.

item.title: UT-68 West at I-15
item.description: UT-68 West at I-15. Use I-15 north to Ogden; I-15 south to Salt Lake City.

item.title: UT-68 East at US-89
item.description: UT-68 East at US-89 in Bountiful.

item.title: I-15 Exit 316 Offramp at UT-68
item.description: I-15 Exit 316 Offramp at UT-68 (West 500 South). Turn left for Woods Cross and West Bountiful. Turn right for Bountiful.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 316
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 316 - UT-68/500 South. Approaching Exit 317 - UT-106 East/400 North.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 315
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 315 - UT-93 East/2600 South.

item.title: I-15 North - North Salt Lake
item.description: I-15 North (UTAH) Shield - North Salt Lake

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 322
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 322 - UT-227 North/200 West.

item.title: End I-215 North at I-15
item.description: End I-215 north at I-15 in North Salt Lake. There is no end sign on I-215, just a junction I-15 sign.

item.title: I-215 North - Exit 27
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 27 - UT-68/Redwood Road.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 85
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 85 - Adams Ave.

item.title: I-84 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-84 west. Distance to Riverdale and Boise. This is the first appearance of Boise on a distance marker on I-84 west.

item.title: Legacy Parkway - Exits 12 and 13
item.description: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) north at Exit 12 - UT-225/Park Lane. Approaching I-15 North/Ogden. Approaching the northern end of Legacy Parkway.

item.title: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) North - Exits 11,12,13
item.description: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) north at Exit 11- US-89 North/South Ogden. Approaching Exit 12 - UT-225/Park Lane. Also approaching Exit 13 - I-15/Ogden.

item.title: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) North - Exit 7
item.description: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) north at Exit 7 - UT-105/Parrish Lane.

item.title: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) North - Exit 4
item.description: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) north at Exit 4 - To UT-68/500 South.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 324
item.description: I-15 North at Exit 324 - US-89 North/To I-84/South Ogden. Continue north on I-15 towards Ogden.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 319
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 319 - UT-105/Parrish Lane.

item.title: End UT-67 South
item.description: End UT-67 south at I-215. There are no ramps for UT-67 south to I-215, just a left merge lane.

item.title: UT-67 South - Exit 4
item.description: UT-67 south at Exit 4 - To UT-68/500 South.

item.title: UT-67 South - Exit 7
item.description: UT-67 south (Legacy Parkway) at Exit 7 - Parrish Lane. The logo above the Parrish Lane text is for Legacy Parkway.

item.title: UT-67 South - Legacy Parkway
item.description: UT-67 south with Legacy Parkway sign and Utah Scenic Byway Sign. Legacy Parkway parallels I-15 south between Farmington and Salt Lake City. It is designated as a scenic byway, and runs along the edge of the Great Salt Lake. Although the highway is an urban freeway, the speed limit is 55 MPH.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 324
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 324 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway. Continue south on I-15 for Salt Lake City. The red light on the sign is for no trucks

item.title: I-15 South - Exits 325 and 324
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 325 - UT-225/Park Lane. Approaching Exit 324 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway.

item.title: I-15 South - Exits 325 and 324
item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 325 - UT-225/Park Lane. Also approaching Exit 325 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway.

item.title: I-15 South Approaching Legacy Parkawy
item.description: I-15 south approaching Legacy Parkway. Trucks with more than 5 axles or greater than 80,000 pounds are prohibited for using Legacy Parkway.

item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 325 - (UT-67)/Legacy Parkway.

item.description: I-15 North at Exit 317 - 400 North.

item.title: I-15 - Exit 315 Onramp
item.description: East 1100 North at I-15. Turn right for I-15 south to Salt Lake. Use left lane for I-15 north to Ogden. Continue east for Bountiful.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 315 Offramp
item.description: E 1100 North at I-15 south to Salt Lake. Continue straight, then right for Woods Cross.

item.description: I-15 north at Exit 315 - 2600 South.

item.title: I-15 South Exit 315 and Exit 316
item.description: I-15 South Exits 315 and 316. Exit 316 - I-215/Belt Route/SL Intl. Airport, and Exit 315 - US-89 South/Beck St.
